TopicTitle: This Christmas, Give the Gift of Reputation.

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

It's time for the holidays again. Whether you're celebrating Christmas, Hanukkah, or Kwanzaa, 'tis the season to be generous and kind.

I propose that on this Christmas day, as many KSP fans as possible try to give at least five Reputation "presents" to other Forum-goers who they remember as being helpful over the past year. If you want to give more, there's nothing stopping you

If you do decide to give the gift of Reputation, please list the people you gave your "presents" to below, as well as a brief reason for why you gave them the +Rep.

I'll start. I gave +Rep to:

>Tw1, for being a great Forum member. I feel a little guilty about the fact that in spite of all his wonderful projects and parodies, I have never given him +Rep... until now.

>Xacktar, because of the fact that he may well be the funniest single Forum-goer out there. I don't think I ever gave him +Rep, either.

>zekes, because I wanted to give him +Rep for his massive Shuttle and never ended up doing so.

>Red Iron Crown, for obvious reasons. He's a huge help with, well, everything.

>KerrMu, because his builds are astoundingly good. He doesn't post often, but when he does, it's always spectacular.

>Nassault630, because in spite of his astoundingly good cinematics, he only has two bars of Reputation so far.

>HatBat, for similar reasons. Thanks for doing what you do, HatBat!

Oh, and no need to give Reputation to me. I'm happy with the amount I have.

Happy Holidays to all!

-Upsilon

That is a good idea! I'm going to forget someone for sure, but here goes, before I go hunt them down:

- Majorjim, because he is civil, interested, and helpful in every post. Very level head with a talent for ship building!

- HatBat, because I always leave him waiting for some ship he asked me for, and still he is a cool guy that keeps on doing awesome videos and featuring my stuff.

- Cupcake, because you gotta respect someone that could fly rings around you, and still shows such humility and good humor. Keep the dropships coming!

- Frozen Heart, because she (I think it's a she) brings always a cheerful comment to every thread. Plus, I hear in a past life she was a mad scientist .

- Scoundrel, because he wrote a funny message to wish me a happy birthday, and in general he has pried more than a laugh in the past with his posts.

Rune. On to the next guy!

I'll give +rep to the next five that post here

Just need about three more rep points till I get my second blob...

ERMAGURD TOO REP POINTS

Edited December 25, 2014 by montyben101

Heh, I was feeling grateful for all the help I got on my thread (I was starting to tear my hair out),

I figured to give all of them rep, cause why not? I was in a good mood (not to mention well rested, trying to troubleshoot while tired isn't fun, to say the least)

I'll give rep to all posters of the first page. And tenth. And...

Because why not post in this thread?

Merry Christmas everyone!

- Rune, for saving my videos from the atrocity that is my ship building, and for always having a smile on his virtual face!

- Spartwo, for doing a huge amount of amazing work on Spirit of Kerbin and for being a great guy!

- SpriteCoke. It's enthralling meeting someone else doing cinematics on the same level. I've learnt great tips from him and had some good laughs.

- SuestraGaming. Similar reasons to SpriteCoke, and for helping me with Spirit of Kerbin.

- ScriptKitt3h, for providing me with the Albion among a lot of other beautiful ships for the Kethane Station!

Have a very Macey Christmas everyone....

Rune, for awesome crafts!

UpsilonAerospace for starting this thread!

Nassault630 for... well, need I explain?

Merry Christmas!

Frohe Weinachten!

Feliz Navidad!

EDIT -

Xacktar too!

Edited December 26, 2014 by Naten

Let me see...

Bagel Rabbit,for making great videos.

Nassault630-same reason as bagel

geschosskopf, for making that training program thread

cupcake, for awesome ssto VTOL drop ships.

And benjee10, for working on the interstellar endypurance mod

and everyone in the ksp atom unity, and all the mods and devs!

Merry Kristmas, everyone!

EDIT: more people:

Xacktar, for the general madness and SCIENCE, and a great fan work (kerb Kerman)

CG_kerbin for making funny videos

SQUAD, for obvious reasons

the team of mods

Gregroxmun, for hype

Avera9eJoe, for being awesome and making nice stuff

Edited December 26, 2014 by Rolanvorxariat

Happy rep-mas!

>zekes, because I wanted to give him +Rep for his massive Shuttle and never ended up doing so.

Thank you so much! I gave rep to everyone on this list, tomorrow when i have more I'll give it to some more people, like Spartwo, Frozen_Heart, Giggleplex, and SpaceXray, for your awesome craft and fun posts.

Edited December 25, 2014 by zekes

I think I'll just give it to five random people. Or maybe more than five, but the more the merrier!

Secret Santa for all us Munchkins! (which is what one of my old teachers used to say. )

I give the gift of rep to my contacts:

Red Iron Crown

Majorjim

LABHOUSE

ZodiaK

And a few modders and others:

Beale for Tantares, one of my favourite mods ever!!

Upsilon for some cool contraptions.

Zekes for cool crafts!!

A very merry Christmas to you all!!

Everyone here, because you're all bloody brilliant!

EDIT: Just tried to give Upsilon rep when it said: "You have given too much rep in the last 24 hours", sorry mate.

Edited December 25, 2014 by Megalodon 720
Merry Christmas to everyone I can give it to!

There are a lot of people I think deserve it.

Zekes.

Majorjim.

RoverDude.

Sal_Vager

Anyone who spends most of their time in the questions thread helping out the new players.

That is a good idea! I'm going to forget someone for sure, but here goes, before I go hunt them down:

- Majorjim, because he is civil, interested, and helpful in every post. Very level head with a talent for ship building!

- HatBat, because I always leave him waiting for some ship he asked me for, and still he is a cool guy that keeps on doing awesome videos and featuring my stuff.

- Cupcake, because you gotta respect someone that could fly rings around you, and still shows such humility and good humor. Keep the dropships coming!

- Frozen Heart, because she (I think it's a she) brings always a cheerful comment to every thread. Plus, I hear in a past life she was a mad scientist .

- Scoundrel, because he wrote a funny message to wish me a happy birthday, and in general he has pried more than a laugh in the past with his posts.

Rune. On to the next guy!

Aww, thanks man! I reciprocated the generous gift of rep.

I have quite a few people who I would like to rep, too many to list here, so I will rep everyone in my contacts

With a special mention to Rune, he's the yin to my yang of craft building, Gusturbo for being one of my main inspirations to build better and Woopert for making videos of some of my craft, and for being an all round good chap.

I'm always amazed by the civility and creativity of this forum.

A very merry Christmas to all!

MJ

Hey everyone!

It's wonderful that you're sharing +Rep, as well as compliments for other players. This Forum is a great place.

That being said: I thought I stated clearly enough that there was no need to give Reputation to me:

Oh, and no need to give Reputation to me. I'm happy with the amount I have.

...and yet, I return to the computer and a lot of people have given me +Rep. Come on, guys!

Anyways, Merry Christmas, and thanks for tagging along with this idea

-Upsilon

I ll try to give rep if the threads let me

Zeke: for being my first friend on the forum and helping me get started

Spartwo: for the honor of my first battle

Hatbat: for hours wasted on YouTube

Markiplier: for first introducing me to KSP

Squad: for making KSP

Markiplier: for first introducing me to KSP

is this THE Markiplier?

Merry Christmas everyone. You guys are all the best. For my gift please just check out my new f-22. I spent a ton of time on it and it will be my last craft until I can afford a new PC.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104622-cb_co-f-22-Raptor-Replica-%28Stock-IR-Version%29
This is a great idea! Giving rep to all of you now . Merry Christmas (And actual Christmas and not Christmas Eve lol)!

Now I have two rep blobs I think I'll do my own:

The sonicgalaxy: for his amazing mods

Rover dude: for mods and generally being nice

YANFRET: for his incredible SLS and Orion mod

Dragon01: I would give him rep for his amazing support and basically keeping the CSS alive but since he got banned I can't :/

YANFRET: for Chaka Monkey Exploration

Cydonian Monk: for his Ad Lunam storyline

Felbourn aka Bob Fitch: for his amazing youtube series.

Tw1: for being cool.

Roverdude: for cranking out an amazing amount of mods of extremely high quality.

Alright, that wraps it up, oh and Beale for his Tantares mod.

Merry christmas.

YANFRET: for Chaka Monkey Exploration

Cydonian Monk: for his Ad Lunam storyline

Felbourn aka Bob Fitch: for his amazing youtube series.

Tw1: for being cool.

Roverdude: for cranking out an amazing amount of mods of extremely high quality.

Alright, that wraps it up, oh and Beale for his Tantares mod.

Merry christmas.

Ven for Stock Revamp.

Roverdude for Roverduding.

NathanKell for making RSS.

So, like one of those pay if forward things? Cool.

That being said: I thought I stated clearly enough that there was no need to give Reputation to me:

I've learnt that if people are gonna rep, they're going to rep no matter.

Sometimes I prefer comments; they make threads less lonely, and bump them so more people will see and engage with the stuff you made/wrote. It's encouraging to have people engage with stuff you've made.

For me, Christmas was technically yesterday, but here's who I've passed the Christmas rep to:

The Error: long time regular reader and commenter in the fanworks section.

LABHOUSE: Another guy from fanworks, also makes models.

HarvesteR: though rep is more about what you do in the forums, the guy who made the game could do with some too.

The Jedi master: another nice forumer, and YouTuber

L3GO: fellow Aussie and YouTuber, has a cool name,

Blackheart612: mod maker, who also did a bit of drawing for me.

Wait, that's not five.

Oops. Uh, merry Christmas!

Edited December 26, 2014 by Tw1

zekes: for his awesome ships
